item.title: How to setup Docker with fuse-overlayfs in Proxmox LXC container
item.description: Create a new LXC Container In Proxmox VE create a unprivileged LXC container with fuse=1,keyctl=1,mknod=1,nesting=1 (I’m not sure if all are needed). In this case I use a Ubuntu 18.04 container. Installation of fuse-overlayfs Then inside the container, install a static version of fuse-overlayfs https://github.com/containers/fuse-overlayfs/releases and place it in /usr/local/bin so it’s named /usr/local/bin/fuse-overlayfs. Installation of docker.io docker.io is the Debian specific build of the Moby container engine. Unlike noted in the Docker documentation this isn’t an old version but rather a version packaged by the Debian Go team.
